recipe_name: New potatoes with beans and olives
author: Phil Vickery
method: Heat the oil and butter in a frying pan and fry the potato quarters until they turn golden-brown.  Add the green beans to the pan and cook for 4-5 minutes, until the beans are tender.  Stir in the olives and salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve as a side dish.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  25g/1oz butter,  200g/7oz cooked new potatoes, quartered,  100g/3½oz green beans, trimmed,  75g/2¾ oz black olives, pits removed, chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
